title: Cant log in PBE pls Help
body: i just got acepted to pbe yesterday and after download the client i just type my username and password but i cant loggin, the screen just say: loggin on but it can stay for hours but i cant log, what can i do??

replies.body: Thank you! We are looking into it right now!  We are having problems with PBE where new player's (without summoner names) can't log in at the moment.
